Portal 2 | November 27, 2019 | [★★★★★]

One of the best games ever made. Humor, Mechanics, Puzzles that requires actual thought. Great price for a game that aged very well.
Excellent for testing skills and it stimulates the brain to solve the "tests". Overall: Excellent
The cake is not a lie.

Really good game so far...
I enjoy the multiplayer mode cuz it's so funny playing with your friend
I recommend so much this game
Longevity ensured by a dearth of custom maps. The main campaign is pretty good too, but you'll remember all of the puzzle solutions by the end of your second run.
Very fun. Puzzling, challenging, immersive, and overall a good game

The sequel to the classic first Portal. Arguably the better of the two games because the graphics were updated, Ellen McLain is back as the sarcastic and witty GLaDOS, the game's principle stayed the same, but the story for Portal 2 is just sooooo much better. I have played through the main story 5 times over now, and am currently on my 6th run, recording everything to be uploaded to YT. I could gush more about the game, but I'd need another few paragraphs to do so. 
Don't forget about the community-created test chambers and Co-op mode after you've done the main story. The fun never ends!
A rooty-tooty portal-shooty puzzle game that's fun for just about everyone. What's not to love?
Good game with good multiplayer, as long as you have good wifi.
Лучшая игра, зэ бест. Даже спустя столько времени ощущается превосходно! Кто ещё не играл, обязательно к прохождению и одиночки, и совместной!
Such a lovable a game that will make you want to break things.
Beyin mıncıklatan efsane. Alın da multi canlansın biraz.
Это было отличное приключение, но даже хорошему всегда приходит конец. Надеюсь на продолжение ( ага щас)
I love the graphics and the thought that went into this game
Very good game. Had one of the best stories of any game I've played. My favorite part was [spoiler] chucking the blue-eyed brit into space. [/spoiler]
probably the best game I've played since half life. It's funny, quirky, and it has one of the most amazing fanbases on steam. another great win for valve
Fun to play co-op when bored.

Ever since this game came out, people would constantly talk about this game and how amazing it was, and of course I believed them, but I just never made an effort to try and play it myself. I saw a couple scenes from here or there and I eventually put it on my wishlist on here. I noticed that both Portal and Portal 2 were .99 cents each and I thought "why not?" However, when I opened Portal 2, I was immediately immersed in this game. I've honestly never experienced this with a game (other than maybe Breath Of The Wild). You can tell how much love and dedication was put into this game. All I want to say is, thank you for making such an amazing game and I can't wait to play more of it :)
o o, portals i must mmm yes

fun as fuck. a game you can continue to play even after you beat the game. very challenging puzzles to make you think but not subtle enough to make you go" how the FUCK was i supposed to figure that out" when you make a mistake it is almost always your fault. the coop is also extremely fun as well. grab a friend and get angry at eachother when you can read eachothers minds. all around a game that makes you think. 10/10
